FuncDef:
The display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command displays traffic statistics about VPWS PWs.
The display traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw command displays VPWS QoS traffic statistics.
The monitor traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw command monitors VPWS QoS traffic statistics continuously.
CLIs: display traffic-statistics l2vpn [ qos ] pw interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ secondary | bypass ]

monitor traffic-statistics l2vpn [ qos ] pw interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ secondary | bypass ] [ [ interval <interval-value> ] [ times { <times-value> | infinity } ] | [ times { <times-value> | infinity } ] [ interval <interval-value> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays VPWS QoS traffic statistics on the specified interface.
-

Displays VPWS QoS traffic statistics about the secondary VPWS PW.
-

Displays VPWS QoS traffic statistics about the bypass VPWS PW.
-

Specifies an interval at which VPWS QoS traffic statistics are displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 2 to 600, in seconds. The default value is 10.

Specifies the number of times that VPWS QoS traffic statistics are to be displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 999. The default value is 5.

Displays VPWS QoS traffic statistics for infinite times.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw interface gigabitethernet 1/0/0
Last 300 seconds QoS statistics rate : 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
<HUAWEI> monitor traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw interface gigabitethernet 1/0/0 interval 2 times 2
Display qos statistics of the pw at the interval of 2 seconds for up to 2 times. Press Ctrl + C to stop.
Last 300 seconds QoS statistics rate : 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
Last 300 seconds QoS statistics rate : 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
<HUAWEI> display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw interface gigabitethernet 1/0/0
Last 300 seconds input rate : 0 bytes/sec, 0 packets/sec
Last 300 seconds output rate: 0 bytes/sec, 0 packets/sec
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The system starts to collect VPWS PW traffic statistics after the function to collect VPWS PW traffic statistics is enabled. To view these traffic statistics for network monitoring or troubleshooting purposes, run the display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command.
The system starts to collect VPWS PW traffic statistics after VPWS PW traffic statistics collection is enabled. You can run the display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command to view these traffic statistics during network monitoring or troubleshooting.
If VPWS QoS is also enabled, you can run the display traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw command to view QoS traffic statistics about VPWS PWs.
To monitor VPWS QoS traffic statistics continuously within a certain period, run the monitor traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw command. After this configuration is performed, VPWS QoS traffic statistics are displayed at a specified interval for a specified number of times.
Prerequisites
The primary VPWS PW and secondary or bypass VPWS PW have been configured on the specified interface, and the function to collect VPWS PW traffic statistics has been enabled.
The primary VPWS PW and secondary or bypass VPWS PW have been configured on the specified interface. VPWS QoS and VPWS PW traffic statistics collection have been enabled.
Precautions
Running the reset traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command clears existing VPWS PW traffic statistics. To view VPWS PW traffic statistics collected during a specified period of time for the network monitoring or troubleshooting purpose, use the display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw and reset traffic-statistics l2vpn pw commands together.If you do not specify secondary or bypass when running the display traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command, the command output shows traffic statistics about the primary VPWS PW.Running the reset traffic-statistics l2vpn pw command clears existing VPWS QoS traffic statistics. To view VPWS QoS traffic statistics collected during a specified period of time for the purpose of network monitoring or troubleshooting, use the display traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw and reset traffic-statistics l2vpn pw commands together.If you do not specify secondary or bypass when running the display traffic-statistics l2vpn qos pw command, the command output shows VPWS QoS traffic statistics about the primary PW.
